plugins.photosPermission: We need access to your photo library to allow you to upload existing photos of attendance sheets or exam irregularities to your reports.
plugins.cameraPermission: We need access to your camera to allow you to take photos of exam attendance sheets and event incidents directly within the app for reporting purposes.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: We need your location to verify that you are physically present at the assigned exam center when submitting attendance and incident reports. This ensures the integrity of the invigilation process.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: We need your location to verify that you are physically present at the assigned exam center when submitting attendance and incident reports. This ensures the integrity of the invigilation process.
